mapper.insert: INSERT INTO regionalTour(addr1, areacode, cat1, cat2, cat3, contentid, contenttypeid, createdtime, firstimage, firstimage2, mapx, mapy, mlevel, modifiedtime, readcount, sigungucode, title, zipcode) VALUES(#{addr1}, #{areacode}, #{cat1}, #{cat2}, #{cat3}, #{contentid}, #{contenttypeid}, #{createdtime}, #{firstimage}, #{firstimage2}, #{mapx}, #{mapy}, #{mlevel}, #{modifiedtime}, #{readcount}, #{sigungucode}, #{title}, #{zipcode});
